## Reproducibility in Social Sciences

- Replication involves both computational requirements and documentation
- Quarto can help with documentation even if you don't use R/Python

## Quarto Includes

- Quarto offers a huge variety of features with more coming!
- Includes are a great way to re-use existing content

## Quarto Websites

- Websites are type of Quarto project
- You can build a website around existing code, data and papers!
